page.title: 11RELIGION
page.content: {Churches }in the area are mostly { {Church of England}and{Non-conformist with one {Spiritualist }Church. They include: Holy Saviour,Church of England. St.Christopher,Church of England. St.Francis,Church of England. West End Free Church. Bitterne United Reformed Church. Bitterne and District Spiritualist Church. Bitterne Methodist Church. Thornhill Baptist Church. St.Andrews Methodist Church. Spring Road Evangelical Church. Church attendance in the area is probably around 10%.The Churches, however,are social centres as well as being {places of worship}.Several organisations meet in church halls,such as Brownies,Guides,Cubs & Scouts and Girls & Boys Brigade.
